summary: This document discusses Cuban affairs within the Department of Defense, focusing on possible retaliatory actions by the Castro government and psychological programs related to Cuba. It includes discussions on actions against U.S. targets in Cuba, actions against U.S. aircraft and shipping, actions against Cuban exiles, and actions against targets in the U.S.
tags: Possible Retaliatory Actions by Cuban Government
title: Cuban Affairs in the Department of Defense
recipient: SecArm, SecNav, SecAir, CJCS, and ASD(ISA)
